website_summaries.verdict: One of the best pool filters for above-ground pools. Also comes at an affordable price.
pros: You will get incredible value in terms of filtration because of the 4-position multi-port valve
Catches more debris than others on the market
cons: It does leak a little if you keep it on for several hours a day

customer_reviews.title: You cannot get spare parts and the seller is useless at helping you
customer_reviews.text: The pump alone works very well, my issue is that you are unable to get spare parts. I contacted the seller who told me that I could find a spare flange valve clamp online with the information in the user manual, but there is no information that is useful. I spent a day and a half trying to find the part with any numbers I could find on the unit and have found nothing that will work. Unfortunately for me I now have to buy a whole new unit to replace the one I bought less than one year ago. I am completely disappointed in the lack of help this company provides on the products they sell.
customer_reviews.author: THeyne

customer_reviews.title: A great unit for the price
customer_reviews.text: This unit is purring away keeping my 14' Intex pool sparkling clean. Only thing I would change is the gauge faces away from you and there is no way to reorient it. The glass also is partway full with water which makes reading from a distance a challenge. All in all, a great unit for the price. Update: August 2018 Still pumping and keeping my 14' above ground pool clear. I substituted sand for crushed glass in the filter which seems to maintain a nice flow without the pressure getting too high. I backwash about once a week. Water is beautifully clear. A huge improvement over the stock pump which was supplied with the pool.
customer_reviews.author: Stephen J. Hughes

customer_reviews.title: Fast shipping, superior product!
customer_reviews.text: Does a phenominal job on our 16' coleman pool. One bag of sand (50lbs). Seller shipped it rapidly. Couldn't be more pleased!! Thank you so much! What a great summer! Update, after most of summer use at least 12 hours a day, it does have a small leak around the pressure gauge. Nothing crazy, doesn't effect water level of pool. Makes reading the pressure gauge harder, but all the YouTube videos say those are usually shot quickly anyway. We can tell via the return pressure in the pool when it needs backwashed anyway. STILL LOVE IT
customer_reviews.author: Carrie Rolofson

customer_reviews.title: Perfect pump
customer_reviews.text: This made a world of difference in our small pool. The puny pump the pool came with could not filter out the iron from our well water or keep algae from growing dispute proper chemical treatments. This sand pump made the water crystal clear within a day. It was confusing to set up at first, but I figured it out on my own eventually.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie

customer_reviews.title: This pump I bought last year easy to hook up
customer_reviews.text: This pump I bought last year easy to hook up. Took 20 mins and it was the best buy for a above ground pool I bought so far. The pool is always crystal clear and I bought the pool skimmer attachment pool is clean and real easy to take care of a must have for above ground pools under 10000 gallons.
customer_reviews.author: Mark erhardt

customer_reviews.title: Very bad quality
customer_reviews.text: The instructions were terrible, and it has never had much force. After hours of YouTube searching I got it assembled, but it hardly pumps at all. It also overheats and shuts off randomly.
customer_reviews.author: 123fbc

customer_reviews.title: Pump acting up..
customer_reviews.text: Please help I don't know what's wrong with my pump it worked great the first week and now I came out and the pump was running but not pumping. the water was just sitting in the lines....after backwashing it started working but it is doing this weird lagging thing every other minute or so....
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: The suction is low pretty often with frequent adjustments it can get powerful. I have a 5200 gallon pool and it works so much better than the one that was provided. Will never regret converting to this pump.
customer_reviews.author: Pamela

customer_reviews.title: It still works great
customer_reviews.text: The only issue with this is I did not protect the stickers with the writing on it. I have to guess which function is what as the writing is gone. Oh well. It still works great
customer_reviews.author: Jayne Hollis

customer_reviews.title: Pump is junk! Seller laughed to the bank!
customer_reviews.text: Bought in December, was hospitalized. By the time I installed the pump, 4 months had gone by. The pump maintains 3 psi! Ridiculous! Very little flow. Contacted seller. "We're sorry, it's passed the 60 days" Horrible seller!
customer_reviews.author: Gunru

customer_reviews.title: Game Changer!
customer_reviews.text: Dont waste your money on those disposable filter cartridges. I wish that we would have invested in this pump years ago. We have a 16 x 48 Summer Escapes pool and this pump is everything! We partnered it with an automatic vacuum and havent had any algae or cloudy water since.
customer_reviews.author: Tonya Brown

customer_reviews.title: Don’t waste your money.
customer_reviews.text: 60 day warranty. Totally worthless. Unit is pushing dirt right back into the pool. Backwash is pushing filter sand out the tube. Unit is garbage. Don’t waste your money. Company is totally useless. Will not fix the problem.
customer_reviews.author: Mike

customer_reviews.title: Excellent filter combo for the price!
customer_reviews.text: Great little filter combo for my above ground pool. I used it all this summer and it's kept the water crystal clear. I've had far more expensive filters that didn't do nearly as well. For a low-budget pump, it really delivers the goods!
customer_reviews.author: Redleg

customer_reviews.title: almost every post I read said this would cover a ...
customer_reviews.text: almost every post I read said this would cover a pool of up to 10,000 gallons my pool was always clear no algae I have the filter running continually and using more chemicals and wall of pool are green It doesn't pave enough pressure to circulate water
customer_reviews.author: Joe

customer_reviews.title: Great performance for the value
customer_reviews.text: Great performance for the value. I used this to replace the stock pump and filter of a 16' Intex. I ran it more often than recommended (nearly 24x7 during the summer) due to 2 large trees over my pool. Easy to assemble but the directions are a bit skimpy.
customer_reviews.author: Discowoodchuck

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Pump and Filter
customer_reviews.text: This product kept our 18' round pool clean all summer. Truly a great deal. The directions are terrible. You will not be able to use the directions. It will take hours to put it together. But once you do, the pump is great. I would have given 5 stars if the directions were not a horrific English translation.
customer_reviews.author: Kelly

customer_reviews.title: Gauge issues
customer_reviews.text: I gave this a 3 star because this is the second one we have purchased and both of them the gauge seems to collect moisture and water and then the gauges stop working!
customer_reviews.author: Becky York

customer_reviews.title: The hoses that come with it are useless.
customer_reviews.text: Bought this filter for 12' round index pool (1500 gal) 5 years ago. Still running great. I have it 4 stars for assembly because the hoses were horribly leaky. after fixing that issue though its been great.
customer_reviews.author: dbones

customer_reviews.title: Works Remarkably Well, Hubby LOVES It, Great Price!
customer_reviews.text: Works Remarkably Well with Our 18 Foot Above Ground Pool! Pool looks great. Hubby LOVES It. Great Price.
customer_reviews.author: Susan M.

customer_reviews.title: NO REPLACEMENT PARTS AVAILABLE
customer_reviews.text: The pump and filter work for me, but, I lost the drain plug when I winterized this year. The company will not sell any replacement parts for this product I would recommend going with an established brand for this reason.
customer_reviews.author: WilliamsHouse

customer_reviews.title: Helped with cleaning up an abused pool
customer_reviews.text: Since the filtration system for the inground pool wasn't working, this cleaned up an 18000 gal pool over the course of a few days. Some essentials were added for suction and return, but it worked well. Used Zeolyte media, but I am sure than conventional sand is also good. Pump primed easily and it pumped at is rated value when paired with large enough suction and return lines.
customer_reviews.author: Thomas C Carrington

customer_reviews.title: No Bueno por Nada
customer_reviews.text: We bought this based on some of the reviews for our above ground pool. First it was a nightmare to install, I am sure we had a page of directions or a part missing. We tried to save money, but you get what you pay for with this one... Not a good buy.
customer_reviews.author: t.virgin

customer_reviews.title: You are not wasting your money!!!!
customer_reviews.text: When I open this box for this product I was skeptical but when my husband hooked it up to the 18 ft pool it worked much better that the original filter. I am happy with it its cost effective and it clears up my pool cloudiness in less time. This product is worth buying trust me I am alway skeptical but it works I'm a happy camper.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: We LOVE this pool pump
customer_reviews.text: We LOVE this pool pump! Easy to maintain and we’ve never had a single issue with it. I wouldn’t hesitate to buy this again should something happen.
customer_reviews.author: Katie

customer_reviews.title: Great filter
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what it said it was, cleans the pool great and if the pressure goes up just flush it and the pressure goes down the filtration goes up the pool is crystal clear and has been for weeks. excellent investment in money and time installing.
customer_reviews.author: Cher Carson

customer_reviews.title: Not the best
customer_reviews.text: First of all there needs to be better instruction on how to hook up the hoses. The hose clamps do not hold well enough. They have come off twice and drained half the water out of the pool before we noticed it. The filter doesn't really clean any better than the one that came with the pool.
customer_reviews.author: Melozone

customer_reviews.title: Great pool pump
customer_reviews.text: This was such a great product it has cleaned our pool beautifully I highly recommend this pump
customer_reviews.author: nerk

customer_reviews.title: no after-purchase support
customer_reviews.text: Pump works great, however, I lost the drain plug cap which is proprietary and apparently they don't sell parts to their own products. Pretty terrible customer service if you ask me.
customer_reviews.author: Josh

customer_reviews.title: You get what you pay for!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this pump filter combo to replace my old one and I have to say I was very disappointed. The pump is barely strong enough and my pool never got clear. I have a 15' pool which i felt wouldn't be too big for this pump. I ran the pump for days and still no results. I purchased a bigger sand filter with a better pump and now my pool is crystal clear. I guess it's true, you get what you pay for!
customer_reviews.author: Semone

customer_reviews.title: Works great!
customer_reviews.text: Cleared up our pool in no time! We purchased this filter pump to replace the dead pump for our 16' coleman pool. Clamps were helpful in keeping the hoses in place/from leaking, so it was no big deal once we figured it out. It runs so quietly too!
customer_reviews.author: jnz322

customer_reviews.title: Works like a dream
customer_reviews.text: We are currently on our second swimming season using this pump and I have zero complaints!
customer_reviews.author: Robert Manuel

customer_reviews.title: So far, So good!
customer_reviews.text: Good product easy installation. Had to get a couple adapters at the local pool supply store for the Intex pool that I installed it on.

customer_reviews.title: Works like a charm!
customer_reviews.text: no issues, just use plenty of plumbing tape when installing the fittings.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect upgrade
customer_reviews.text: Our pool has never been so clean. Once I got it set up it only took a few hours before pool was crystal clear. Has held up perfectly over last 2 season.

customer_reviews.title: Pump works much better than the cheap pump that came with our pool
customer_reviews.text: Pump works much better than the cheap pump that came with our pool. If you are looking to upgrade or looking for a affordable pump. This is a good choice.

customer_reviews.title: Worth it
customer_reviews.text: Works great on my summer waves pool 5000 gallon had to retro fit some hoses simple if you are good with your hands...got my pH adjusted shocked it and Crystal clear water in 2 days

customer_reviews.title: the water is still dirty and we have to put it in a certain ...
customer_reviews.text: This product had such rave reviews it stinks. It has a leak that we cannot fix, the water is still dirty and we have to put it in a certain position on top for it to pump that is not even the correct position. Please see photos attached.
customer_reviews.author: Vicki Crumpler

customer_reviews.title: Powerful pump
customer_reviews.text: I used this on a 8 foot by 30 inch deep pool with a solar panel. It worked wonderfully. It has great suction and kept the water really clear. You do have to use special sand.

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: works good but I wish it had a time so it was not running all day
customer_reviews.author: gregory

customer_reviews.title: Works great.
customer_reviews.text: We had algae and cloudy pool water issues. This product greatly helped reduce both issues. I now use less chemicals. I did have issues finding flexible 1.5" tube that would fit over the hose barbs I got at ACE hardware, but that has nothing to do with this product. Works great.
customer_reviews.author: Stephen gebren

customer_reviews.title: Works Fabulous, less then 3hrs after we set up ...
customer_reviews.text: Works Fabulous, less then 3hrs after we set up the pump our murky pool was clear for the first time all summer!

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Had this for about a year and keeps my pool crystal clear with less chemicals

customer_reviews.title: Just buy it
customer_reviews.text: Great filter with easily switchable functions and my water looks wonderful week after week.

customer_reviews.title: Great product!!
customer_reviews.text: Working perfect in my 14x52 pool. Keep water Crystal clear.

customer_reviews.title: This pump did not fit my current pool as described ...
customer_reviews.text: This pump did not fit my current pool as described. I bought this pump as a back up for my current pump since I knew it would be going out soon, and was unable to return it! VERY dissatisfied!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great for the price.
customer_reviews.text: Bought to replace the cheapo pump that comes along with my index pool. I was able to put this together in less than a hour.
customer_reviews.author: In desperate need of coffee!

customer_reviews.title: Horrible Customer Service
customer_reviews.text: Horrible customer service. Was on hold for over an hour. Their web site says they have a chat feature and that is a lie. Product is 6 months old and no longer working.

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: Great product. Easy set up. Made such a difference in keeping out pool clean.

customer_reviews.title: Pump works great for my 16ft pool
customer_reviews.text: Pump works great for my 16ft pool. I've had it 2 months now without any issues. Definitely more powerful than what came with the pool.

customer_reviews.title: sand filter
customer_reviews.text: It works a lot better than the filters that come with your pool. easy to take care of. the more power the better

customer_reviews.title: This pump works great and is very quite
customer_reviews.text: This pump works great and is very quite. Easy to install, I had to buy new hoses and clamps in order to fit my above ground pool.

customer_reviews.title: Sand pumps are the best!!!
customer_reviews.text: This pump was a fantastic buy! It has done a way better job at keeping my pool clean than previous pumps. I have had it for 2 summers now and wish I would have switched to sand sooner. Very easy to run as well since I was able to figure it out lol.

My pool is set up under trees and has four little boys that are in and out of it so its quite a feat to stay as clean as it is. The only drawback is that it seems to leak a tiny bit of sand into the output so I get a fine layer of sand across the pool bottom.

customer_reviews.title: Minimal maintenance and works GREAT!
customer_reviews.text: We just bought a 18' above ground pool and the pump that came with it was pitiful. We bought this and it cleaned up our pool within a matter of 48 hours leaving no sand or debris on the bottom and the water is crystal clear. I'm VERY happy with this purchase as it leaves little to no maintenance other than keeping up with the chemicals. I recommend it for anyone getting an above ground pool.
customer_reviews.author: Jordan S.

customer_reviews.title: This Pump/Filtration system will last  you thru many $200 Above Ground Pools.
customer_reviews.text: If you Have an Above Ground Pool with an Undersized Filtration system that came with it that is always breaking Buy This System. It's easy to install if your familiar with basic pool plumbing. After just 24hrs running water was crystal clear and provides excellent suction for vacuuming off the bottom of the pool. I installed a dedicated suction hook up and a second outlet for max flow rates. To have an actual Catch basket built in to the pump is Awesome will upload a pictutre later. The Pump/Filtration is a keeper from Pool to Pool.
customer_reviews.author: Annita Radford

customer_reviews.title: Electric cord is only 3 feet long
customer_reviews.text: Good except electric cord is only 3 feet long. Changing out cord very difficult as need a 3 bladed screwdriver to open the housing. A 3 foot cord for a pool pump is dangerous!

customer_reviews.title: Works good, pool staying clear
customer_reviews.text: Work good so far...I'll get back to you next year

customer_reviews.title: ... to purchase and a few people said it worked great with their 15' pools
customer_reviews.text: I read the reviews prior to purchase and a few people said it worked great with their 15' pools. I have an above ground 15' pool with aluminum siding. This filter system does not have any power to circulate the water in my pool. It also does not have enough power to hook a vacuum to it in order to clean out the bottom of the pool. Disappointed that I will not be able to return and get the correct size :-( The assembly however was easy enough if you have ever put together any filter or pump before.
customer_reviews.author: Lynn

customer_reviews.title: nice to rid ourselves of the always out of stock paper filters
customer_reviews.text: we needed a filter due to never being able to find the wasteful paper filters anywhere. this filter does its job. it might not clear our pool as well as we expected from past experiences with another filter system and pool, but this filter does what is expected for the price we paid.
customer_reviews.author: a reader by choice

customer_reviews.title: great

customer_reviews.title: Pump works Great!! The only issue I found was with ...
customer_reviews.text: Pump works Great!! The only issue I found was with the instructions, they could have been more informative. My brother in law said; these instructions are for someone who has dealt with this type of pump.(a professional) After a few video's I was able to get it hooked up. It works great, with little maintenance. ,
customer_reviews.author: Denise Porter

customer_reviews.title: Should have bought this first!!
customer_reviews.text: I got this setup last year. It is still working great! Keeps my pool crystal clear. I bought 4 replacement cartridge filter pumps from INTEX in a 2 year span, and that was such a waste of money. I could have bought 3 more of these sand filter pumps for the money I spent on the those. Live and learn. Even if this unit was to fail I would get another one. I like it that much.
customer_reviews.author: Dustin S.

customer_reviews.title: Horrible sound
customer_reviews.text: Can not believe I wasted my money on this pump. After having this pump for a month it now makes a loud and annoying sound. Tried to return it and it is not eligible for return so now I have to find another pump.
customer_reviews.author: mbmalugin

product_meta.title: Best Choice Products Pro 2400GPH 13" Sand Filter Above Ground Swimming Pool Pump 10000GAL
product_meta.description: Best Choice Products proudly presents this brand new Sand Filter and Pump, for use with above-ground pools. Designed to handle the filtration needs of many of today's pools, this pump and filter system is designed as a low-cost maintenance option to keep your pool clean and pristine. The pump provides a powerful and efficient way to receive water from the skimmer and into the filter tank. The core of this system is the one-piece blow-molded tank that sits atop a universal base. This item includes a top-mounted, 4-position multi-port valve, and has a high-capacity sand bed to catch more debris and extend filter cycles. Together, the pump and filter provide an easy-to-use, simple-to-install solution that functions to keep your above-ground pool clean and sparkling. Maintain your pool with the Sand Filter and Pump by Best Choice Products! DISCLAIMER: Sand is not included and the pool pump does not work with INTEX Pools. SPECIFICATIONS: Overall Dimensions: 23.5”(H) x 13"(W); Sand Filter: 13"; Weight: 23.54 lbs.; Capacity: 42 lbs. of sand; Sand Size: 0.018-0.022in (0.45-0.56mm); Horsepower: 0.35 HP; Gallons Per Hour: 2,400 GPH; Max Suction: 32 ft.; Max Water Temp: 105°F; D1-1/4 NPT Inlet & Outlet; 115V 60HZ 8.8AMP; Some assembly required;
feature_bullets: ETL listed mark proving your product has been independently tested and meets the applicable published safety standard as well as being CSA certified
